DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to define the sensitivity and specificity of a novel continuous noninvasive blood pressure monitor.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of Pulse Waveform Analysis-based Continuous Noninvasive Blood Pressure Measurement Sensor
DOC.detailed_description: A novel continuous noninvasive blood pressure monitor is compared to invasive arterial measurement at postoperative care unit after a planned operation. Monitor captures also saturation and ECG, which are compared to traditional monitoring.
DOC.criteria: subjected to operative treatment with the need for invasive blood pressure measurement spontaneous ventilation able to give informed consent denial by patient pacemaker
